name: Dungeons and Doggos
description:
Jump as high as you can!

Help! Your owner is trapped in a dungeon high on Mount Dragonspire! Being the ever faithful companion you spring to action stomping every dragon in your path to find your beloved owner (who else will play fetch with you). Beware though, the path ahead is fraught with danger. Will you be able to find your owner before it's too late?

Features
  • You can pet the Doggo
  • Story & Score modes
  • Cute comic book style story
  • Unlockable hats (featuring characters from other Playdate games)
  • Printable 4k posters included in purchase
  • Manual including a coloring book page
  • You can experience TRUTH
  • Double jumps
Accessibility

This game was optimized for both right- and left-handed players. If you're struggling playing the game with the right hand, then go to your Playdates "Settings" -> "Accessibility" and turn on "Upside Down" mode.

There's also a different control scheme for playing on the simulator. If you're using the Simulator make sure to turn the screen by going to "View" -> "Rotate Left".

Giveaway

Create some fan art of Dungeons & Doggos, or finish the story mode of the game and send a picture of your scoreboard to PizzaFuelDev (on any platform), until the end of March 2023 to enter a giveaway for Santos Sisters Issues 1-3! At the beginning of April a random winner will be chosen, who'll receive the 3 comic books over mail.

Conditions

You'll be eligible to win as long as you're 18+, living in a country I can ship the books too, willing to accept the comic books and as long as giveaways are legal in your country.

Important: You do not need to have bought the game to enter the giveaway. As long as you were able to created some fan art or play it on the Playdate or Simulator and beat the story mode you're good to go!

Disclaimer

This game is not affiliated with Santos Sisters, or the web comic of the same name as the game! (That being said: It's pretty good. Go check it out.)
